shoutwikiapi-desc: A collection of ShoutWiki-specific API modules
apihelp-query+listwikis-description: List all available wikis on ShoutWiki
apihelp-query+listwikis-summary: List all available wikis on ShoutWiki
apihelp-query+listwikis-param-wid: Unique, wiki-specific ID number; use this when you want to get info about a specific wiki and you know its ID number
apihelp-query+listwikis-param-from: Get all wikis with ID that is equal to or greater than this value
apihelp-query+listwikis-param-to: Get all wikis with ID that is equal to or lower than this value
apihelp-query+listwikis-param-lang: Wiki language code (i.e. en for English, fi for Finnish, etc.)
apihelp-query+listwikis-param-countonly: Return only the amount of wikis
apihelp-query+listwikis-param-limit: Get information about this many wikis at once
apihelp-query+listwikis-param-start: The timestamp to start enumerating from
apihelp-query+listwikis-example-2: Also include deleted wikis in the listing
apihelp-query+listwikis-example-3: Get information about the wiki whose ID is #177
apihelp-query+listwikis-example-4: Get all (active) wikis with IDs ranging from 100 to 150
apihelp-query+listwikis-example-5: Show all Finnish (fi) wikis whose IDs range between 10 to 50
apihelp-query+listwikis-example-6: Show the total amount of active wikis
apihelp-query+listwikis-example-7: Show the total amount of all wikis ever, including deleted ones
